comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Francis Henry Wadsworth, Captain of the RMS Caledonia, Anchor Line, Glasgow, was elected to the Royal Astronomical Society in 1913: articles.adsabs.harvard.edu//full/1913MNRAS..73..485./000... He had been third mate on the SS Utopia at the time of its sinking disaster in 1891, at Gibraltar: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SS_Utopia

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Pach Brothers photographers: broadway.cas.sc.edu/index.php?action=showPhotographer&amp... Caledonia was sunk by a German U-Boat on December 4, 1916, but Wadsworth was no longer her captain at that time. www.wrecksite.eu/wreck.aspx?135648

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca and artolog: thanks for the additional information.  We will update the record.
